entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 5.
